target_paper.title: Soo et al. 2018
target_paper.objective_summary: The main research objective of Soo et al. 2018 is to study the growth conditions of Ms. trichosporium OB3b and explore genetic manipulation techniques, including plasmids for mutagenesis, conjugation, and electroporation. The approach involves constructing linear DNA fragments and preparing electrocompetent cells for the genetic manipulation process.
